title: Epic 1 - Loan Application Portal
description: Develop a customer-facing portal to allow applicants to submit loan requests, upload documents, and track application status.

userStories.title: User Story 1 - Loan Application Form
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to complete and submit a loan application form online so that I can apply for a loan without visiting the bank.
userStories.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Web-based Loan Application Portal for customers

tasks.title: Task 1 - Design Loan Application Form UI & Submission Logic
tasks.description: Create responsive and accessible web forms for personal and home loans, including basic validation and mock submission logic.
acceptance_criteria: Form fields align with loan requirements.
Validation is applied to all mandatory fields.
Supports both personal and home loan types (mock selection).
Confirmation message displayed upon successful submission.

userStories.title: User Story 2 - Application Status Tracking
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to track my loan application status so that I stay informed throughout the process.

tasks.title: Task 1 - Build Status Tracker Component
tasks.description: Create UI component to display real-time application progress, dynamically updating via mock backend API.
acceptance_criteria: Displays status: Submitted, Under Review, Approved, or Rejected.
Updates dynamically via mock backend API.

title: Epic 2 - Automated Document Verification
description: Automate document verification using OCR to reduce manual processing time and improve accuracy.
relatedPRDSection: High-Level Deliverables: 3. Automated Document Verification Service

userStories.title: User Story 1 - Document Upload & OCR Processing
userStories.description: As a user, I want the system to automatically verify my uploaded documents so that I don't have to manually validate them.
userStories.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Integration with: Document OCR service

tasks.title: Task 1 - Integrate OCR API & Handle Failures
tasks.description: Develop a component for uploading documents, simulating OCR processing, and handling verification failures with mock notifications.
acceptance_criteria: OCR API successfully extracts text from uploaded documents (mock).
Verification status returned and stored in system (mock).
System flags failed verifications for manual review (mock).
Users receive notification for re-upload if required (mock).

title: Epic 3 - Credit Check Integration
description: Connect with external credit bureaus to assess applicant creditworthiness automatically.
relatedPRDSection: High-Level Deliverables: 4. Credit Check Integration Module

userStories.title: User Story 1 - Credit Bureau Integration & Display
userStories.description: As a loan officer, I want the system to automatically fetch credit scores from the Credit Bureau API and display them in the dashboard so that I can make informed approval decisions.
userStories.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Integration with: Credit Bureau API

tasks.title: Task 1 - Implement Credit Bureau API Integration & Display
tasks.description: Simulate fetching credit scores from a Credit Bureau API and display the mock data within an application detail view.
acceptance_criteria: Credit score fetched successfully for each applicant (mock).
API error handling implemented for unavailability (mock).
Credit score visible in application details view (mock).
System logs each API request for compliance (mock message).

title: Epic 4 - Notifications and Reporting
description: Develop automated notifications and reporting capabilities for both customers and administrators.

userStories.title: User Story 1 - Notification System
userStories.description: As a user, I want to receive automated notifications about my loan status so that I stay updated without manual follow-ups.
userStories.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Automated Notifications and Reminders via email and SMS

tasks.title: Task 1 - Integrate Email & SMS Services
tasks.description: Implement a mock UI to simulate sending email and SMS notifications when a loan status changes.
acceptance_criteria: Notifications sent when loan status changes (mock trigger).
SMS and email templates are customizable (mock content display).

userStories.title: User Story 2 - Reporting Dashboard
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want a reporting dashboard to analyze loan application trends and system performance.
userStories.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Basic Reporting and Analytics dashboard

tasks.title: Task 1 - Build Reporting Dashboard UI
tasks.description: Create an analytics dashboard with mock charts and KPIs (total applications, approvals, rejections).
acceptance_criteria: Displays total applications, approvals, and rejections.
Reports exportable as PDF or CSV (mock button/message).
